meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of microvilli.
meanings.sent1: The microvillous structures help in absorbing nutrients efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The small intestine is lined with microvillous projections for nutrient absorption.
meanings.sent3: The microvillous cells threw a tiny party to celebrate their role in digestion.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was as precise as the microvillous structures in the intestines.
meanings.sent5: The microvillous appearance of the surface increased its ability to capture nutrients.

meanings.sent1: The microvillous surface of the cell membrane enhances absorption.
meanings.sent2: The microvillous border of the cells increases their surface area.
meanings.sent3: The microvillous coating on the surface made the cell look like a tiny forest.
meanings.sent4: Her hair glistened in the sunlight, resembling a microvillous texture.
meanings.sent5: The microvillous layer on the skin provided extra protection against external factors.
